ImageSet.Name: EUVE 555 : Extreme Ultraviolet Explorer 555 Angstroms
ImageSet.Credits: Center for Extreme UV Astronomy, University of California at Berkeley. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope (euve555, Min=5, Max=500).

ImageSet.Name: GALEX 2 Near-UV
ImageSet.Credits: Space Telescope Science Institute. The GALEX, Galaxy Explorer, instrument allows imaging and spectroscopic observations to be made in two ultraviolet bands, Far UV 1350-1780A and Near UV 1770-2730A. This is the GR2/3 release, not the most recent GR4 release. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope.

ImageSet.Name: Extreme Ultraviolet Explorer
ImageSet.Credits: Data from Center for Extreme UV Astronomy, University of California at Berkeley. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope. Red is 555 Angstroms (euve555), Green 405 Angstroms, Red 83 Angstroms.

ImageSet.Name: GALEX 2 Far-UV
ImageSet.Credits: Space Telescope Science Institute. The GALEX, Galaxy Explorer, instrument allows imaging and spectroscopic observations to be made in two ultraviolet bands, Far UV 1350-1780A and Near UV 1770-2730A. This is the GR2/3 release, not the most recent GR4 release. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope.

ImageSet.Name: EUVE 171 : Extreme Ultraviolet Explorer 171 Angstroms
ImageSet.Credits: Center for Extreme UV Astronomy, University of California at Berkeley. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope (euve171, Min=4, Max=200).

ImageSet.Name: GALEX 2 Combined
ImageSet.Credits: Space Telescope Science Institute. The GALEX, Galaxy Explorer, instrument allows imaging and spectroscopic observations to be made in two ultraviolet bands, Far UV 1350-1780A and Near UV 1770-2730A. This is the GR2/3 release, not the most recent GR4 release. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope.

ImageSet.Name: EUVE 83 : Extreme Ultraviolet Explorer 83 Angstroms
ImageSet.Credits: Center for Extreme UV Astronomy, University of California at Berkeley. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope (euve83, Min=1, Max=150).

ImageSet.Name: EUVE 405 : Extreme Ultraviolet Explorer 405 Angstroms
ImageSet.Credits: Center for Extreme UV Astronomy, University of California at Berkeley. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope (euve405, Min=0.7, Max=70).

ImageSet.Name: GALEX 4 Far-UV
ImageSet.Credits: This is the Far UV band(1350-1780A) of the GALEX GR4 data release archived at MAST/STScI. TOAST-formatted mosaics were obtained using facilities of NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope.

ImageSet.Name: GALEX 4 Near-UV
ImageSet.Credits: This is the Near UV band (1770-2730A) of the GALEX GR4 data release archived at MAST/STScI. TOAST-formatted mosaics were obtained using facilities of NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope.

ImageSet.Name: GALEX (Ultraviolet)
ImageSet.Credits: Space Telescope Science Institute. TOAST-formatted data was obtained from NASA's SkyView Virtual Telescope. The Galaxy Explorer instrument allows observations to be made in ultraviolet bands Far UV 1350-1780A and Near UV 1770-2730A. This is the GR2/3 release.
